        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">

    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="472" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="472" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.17</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="8062">8,062</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="950"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Silver Mountain Water</b> by <b>Creed</b> is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. <b>Silver Mountain Water</b> was launched in 1995. Silver Mountain Water was created by Olivier Creed and Pierre Bourdon. Top notes are Bergamot and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Green Tea and Black Currant; base notes are Musk, Sandalwood, Petitgrain and Galbanum. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Silver Mountain Water by Creed is an Aromatic fragrance for men. Inspired by Olivier Creed's fondness for skiing, Silver Mountain Water was designed to evoke the sparkling high-mountain streams of water in the Swiss Alps.</p>

<p>The white bottle capped with a silver cap resembles a snow-topped mountain with a glistening silver stream.</p>

<p>The fragrance opens with bergamot and mandarin, followed by a heart featuring green tea and black currant. The base is composed of Galbanum, musk, sandalwood and petit grain.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a                                     width="180" height="180"
                                 style="position: absolute;width: 100%;height: 100%;object-fit: cover;display: block;top:0;left: 0;right: 0;bottom: 0;padding: 2px"
                                 src="https://fimgs.net/photogram/p180/fl/my/NcaRHY0LxSvrilOQ.jpg">
                        </a>
                                                                            </div>
            </div>
            </div>
</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="472"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.97402164791485; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.75.jpg" style="width: 3.8rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Bergamot-75.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Bergamot</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.86407633150587; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.82.jpg" style="width: 3.1rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Mandarin-Orange-82.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Mandarin Orange</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.106.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Tea-106.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Green Tea</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.132.jpg" style="width: 4.175rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Black-Currant-132.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Black Currant</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.4.jpg" style="width: 4.1rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Musk-4.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Musk</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.82555956097059; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.33.jpg" style="width: 2.9rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Sandalwood-33.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Sandalwood</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.82046435076082; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.3.jpg" style="width: 2.875rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Petitgrain-3.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Petitgrain</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.45.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Galbanum-45.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Galbanum</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="472"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='3074e09996e4ae7f987f9f6b7ca98aec270' slotpayload='{"ct":"C9un6iTkZ\/3If89SdmN0XCAEzirzM0GLpEbuaU2WJMgJRf7d47ep+wvJeYb2jiKmeOOH7MKczC49\/\/24Eq8npMC75hsm\/bMXio1t55LLD3Eivmy+TulUU9+bVAMg8ktE+DZM4NtJPqWx8xr9tMY+3EW1tk8hD5oQwJcJ2hfnTulYgm+z6NgWrfbpxAs81xFaH2gh7B7f89gTZYa2om+C5w+FLxefDTl9rE2wLEZmhKcJxP0tIy6q9wlFYOyhycVZWuLlwO4I3E0fjJA+g6C\/U10pNkBsidD+pTu6sSx8II\/6+aWXIrpzTnKijlfsOBx6","iv":"c728213ef74b786683c2a0654f428c3a","s":"0d5f781cfb2e78a3"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

class="linkrg"><span title="/board/register.php" class="rtg">Become a member of this online perfume community and you will be able to add your own reviews.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="cell <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2353064" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2353064" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sniffer 65"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1476227"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1476227.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sniffer 65" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2353064ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2353064" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1476227">sniffer 65</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-18"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1731951869" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This and GIT are the poster children of the influence of massive marketing by the "conglomerate-niche" houses.  You smell what they want you to smell.  GIT is the obvious one.  It is a calone bomb with massive similarities to Cool Water.  But because GIT contains the word "Green" and Cool Water is in a blue bottle, GIT is constantly referred to as a "green fragrance" while Cool Water is a "blue fragrance."  I can guarantee you that if this was called "Desert Paradise", and heavily marketed that way, people would be saying that they could smell the scents of a Saharan market.  There is nothing watery about this one.  On the other hand, it is extremely synthetic, and has terrible performance in its current edition.  If you really want to drop $250 for a bottle of this, that's fine, but this is not a blind buy candidate.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2353064"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2353064#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2351238" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2351238" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Benji_36V"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2323804"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2323804.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Benji_36V" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2351238ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2351238" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2323804">Benji_36V</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-16">11/16/24 14:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I genuinely find this disgusting. Worst fragrance I have ever smelled</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2351238"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2351238#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2349770" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2349770" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PWPPWP"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2172608"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="PWPPWP" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2349770ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2349770" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2172608">PWPPWP</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-15">11/15/24 06:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Like GIT, my first impression reminds me of the Mefistos. This more than GIT.<br />
Have to do a deeper dive on all of them.<br />
Again, beautiful (masculine), luxurious smelling.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2349770"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2349770#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2349067" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2349067" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Thamac15"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1816276"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Thamac15" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2349067ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2349067" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1816276">Thamac15</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-14">11/14/24 13:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful scent! However, the longevity is a mere 1-2 hours at most.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2349067"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2349067#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2342293" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2342293" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thegadabout"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/106664"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.106664.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thegadabout" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kuumba-Made/Enchantment-32038.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32038.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Enchantment"title="Enchantment"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2342293ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2342293" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/106664">thegadabout</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-08">11/08/24 12:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Reminds me of getting hit by cold wind on a sunny winter hike. Refreshing, bracing, uplifting... gorgeous. Definitely not warm or inviting. An intimidatingly beautiful ballerina would wear it very well. Sadly, there are two counts against it in my book: the price, and the fact that it transports me back to a very particular time and place when I smell it. Just makes it feel a bit less versatile.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2342293"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2342293#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2338392" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2338392" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="karlovonamesti"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/19849"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.19849.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="karlovonamesti" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.472.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Silver Mountain Water"title="Silver Mountain Water"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2338392ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2338392" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/19849">karlovonamesti</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-04">11/04/24 20:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The ink note in this one is what makes it for me. It reminds me of the Rotring Rapidograph cartridge pens I used to draw with as a teenager. Silver Mountain Water appears to be just a fancy "fresh" frag, "CK One for Millionaires" as someone once put it, but it's more than that, due to the ink note. If you're someone who enjoys drawing, or who scribbled away years of his misspent youth at a drafting table, it might not be about smelling like a cool person who has the latest greatest freshest thing on; your interest might be in the chemical odor and how it contrasts to the freshness.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2338392"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2338392#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2338284" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2338284" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="erinlale"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2273104"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2273104.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="erinlale" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bath-Body-Works/Fiji-Sunshine-Guava-Tini-65878.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65878.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fiji Sunshine Guava Tini"title="Fiji Sunshine Guava Tini"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2338284ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2338284" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2273104">erinlale</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-04">11/04/24 18:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Cloth test:<br />
Complex. Multi-level. I can smell each note like I'm hiking up a mountain, encountering different plants and landscapes on the way up. And then skiing back down. Some of the notes are too herbaceous to be worn as an everyday scent. I really thought I could smell silver, which I know is impossible in reality; perhaps it was psychological suggestion, or some combination of fresh and scintillating scents that seemed silvery to my mind. Like light on a rapidly moving stream. Do I smell trees? Shrubs? Water? Snow? Rock? The scent of the dry down is weird with some sort of plant note with which I am unfamiliar, and I would hesitate to wear this perfume around other people unless I wanted them to think I had just been out skiing. But I still like it, and will find appropriate times to enjoy it.<br />
<br />
Skin:<br />
Really got the citrus top note. The middle notes are delectable, I want to drink that tea and eat that black currant jam. This is turning into a gourmand on my skin and oh wait there is that tree and shrub effect I got on the cloth. I can identify the sandalwood. That plant smell in the dry down that I found to be too weird for the bank on the cloth test now smells sweet like a demonstration garden of native wildflowers and shrubberies. Everything wild and with an edge of danger and oddness from the cloth test is now tamed and made orderly. It increases the places I could wear this but I'm not sure I like swapping the ski slope for garden center. I think I will want to enjoy both the cloth effect and the skin effect, and may even try spraying it in my car and enjoying a little bubble of mountain air as I go about the city.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2338284"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2338284#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2332708" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2332708" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LongNoseLong____"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1844113"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LongNoseLong____" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2332708ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2332708" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1844113">LongNoseLong____</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-30">10/30/24 12:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love this, but the performance is so bad off my skin that I can't justify the price</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2332708"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2332708#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2327972" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2327972" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kojon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1939153"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1939153.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kojon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2327972ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2327972" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1939153">Kojon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-26">10/26/24 01:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To be honest, SMW takes the cake when it comes to clean, generic fragrances. The way this is formulated has this sort of non-descript cleanliness about it that makes it so elegant and addictive. It doesn't smell like shower gel, it doesn't smell like something that's easy to put your finger on, which makes it a great scent for those who aren't particularly into fragrances. It's actually kind of stunning in a way. This is something that literally anyone out there can make their signature scent if they personally find it appealing. The notes are fairly accurate, but off the top there really isn't too much citrus. It's mostly green tea, woodiness, musk, and a slight touch of brightness from the blackcurrant and mandarin. This makes it a very cool and uplifting fragrance meant for warmer weather, while maintaining a bit of that rich, deep, musky scent that makes it very attractive and unique.<br />
<br />
With that being said, expect this to be anything groundbreaking, I don't think the target consumer is enthusiasts as it is a bit on the boring and slightly generic side. However, it is still a masterpiece and will definitely serve those well who like it. Reminds me a bit of Blvgari Glacial Essence (which I own a bottle of and like a lot) but so much better. Performance is decent, but everyone knows what Creed prices are like. If you like the scent and can afford it then go for it, it's honestly one of the few Creed fragrances I would personally recommend. It's also worth mentioning that this is more of a masculine-leaning fragrance in my opinion, but there's no reason why a woman couldn't pull it off if it fits them. Would love to own a bottle someday.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2327972"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2327972#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2327807" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2327807" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alpine0"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1685446"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1685446.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alpine0" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2327807ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2327807" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1685446">alpine0</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-25">10/25/24 20:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>in my opinion, it leans more feminine. It smells fresh but in my opinion the floral notes kind of overpower anything that could possibly make it more unisex. Slight sweetness mixed with floral notes makes it more feminine, at least in my opinion. EDIT: after using it again, I can now see how it can be a masculine fragrance. The opening is just very sweet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2327807"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2327807#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2320013" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2320013" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Christian essence"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2233082"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2233082.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Christian essence" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2320013ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2320013" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2233082">Christian essence</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-18">10/18/24 13:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This Is ck One fragrance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2320013"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2320013#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2318035" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1906364">Angelus Libri</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-11">10/11/24 14:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Preforms like an overpriced Eau De Cologne</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2312541"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2312541#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2312239" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2312239" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nick-Euphonia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2271678"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2271678.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nick-Euphonia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2312239ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2312239" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2271678">Nick-Euphonia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-11">10/11/24 09:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>From a carded sample.<br />
<br />
Opening doesn't have any citrus to me at all, it's very linen-like, and aldehydic. I immediately get the "tea" - but I drink green tea a lot and it doesn't smell like green tea to me, it's almost like a fermented, light, spritzy tea drink that they'd get served in a swanky Singaporean hotel. It's mega clean, soft and fine. This stuff is the smell of sprawling out on a cloud.<br />
<br />
The longevity is very minimal, and projection is on the lower side. I get it, with a scent as delicate as this, it's not going to be super powerful. Like other Creed, it's a gorgeous, clean and harmonious scent, but it's power is very minimal. Great 8.5/10 scent, but over all because of price and performance, I'd give this a 7/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2312239"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2312239#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2311155" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2311155" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Farrque"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201583"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1201583.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Farrque" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Indemodables/Ambre-Supreme-70274.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70274.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ambre Suprme"title="Ambre Suprme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2311155ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2311155" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201583">Farrque</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-10">10/10/24 09:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Aquatic salinity with a aldehydic, fresh air quality to it.<br />
On skin lots of white pepper to back this up as well as ambergris. <br />
A pleasant scent and I understand why people see it as a signature dumb-reach but it's just too minimalistic to be interesting. Especially considering Creed's pretty solid catalogue. <br />
Screwed up big time by making this bottle white and Himalaya silver as well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2311155"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2311155#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2305114" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2305114" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Turbo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1067509"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1067509.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Turbo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/K-by-Dolce-Gabbana-Eau-de-Parfum-62311.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62311.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="K by Dolce & Gabbana Eau de Parfum"title="K by Dolce & Gabbana Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2305114ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2305114" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1067509">Turbo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-04">10/04/24 16:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Interesting, took some time to dry off and show its purpose. It's unique. I can't stand the marketing of this company, although I guess because there are so many people that wear affliction, true religion and think the more hair, the better, the more tatoos, the better, the success makes sense. Glad I dont follow the status quo. I think this brand is cheap and tasteless. But this cologne is one of the better I've sampled. If it were affordable I might pick up a small bottle of it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2305114"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2305114#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2297262" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Clean, inoffensive. Yes, it is clean. But it smells like a typical department store designer male fragrance. (Platinum Egoiste comes to mind.) Albeit, you can consider it the king of the hill of this type, a step above all the others, but I don't find anything unique here. Surely a compliment getter, though. It does smell good. But I wouldn't buy it. <br />
<br />
Side note: I think Viking is SMW with some mint, which is enough to make it stand out from the crowd.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2291600"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2291600#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2287832" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Not a safe blind buy, you might find yourself smelling a fragrance youve been using already from how generic this one smells. I could get something that smells the same for a fraction of the price. Doesnt even last that long. Its not unpleasant, just not worth the price tag.<br />
<br />
-longevity 3/10, scent 5/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2287832"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2287832#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2287601" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Especially when there are amazimg dupes out there which actually perform WAY better! Smdh.<br />
<br />
 The people over at Creed should be ashamed for charging more and more for worse and worse performing fragrances. Its kind of offensive how smugg they've become tbh. Then people wonder why "Clones" have become so popular. Not to mention that this niche house only charges that insane amount just to remain "exclusive" and who are they excluding? Hard working people working paycheck to paycheck who have more pressing priorities such as feeding their families and prividing a roof over their heads?<br />
<br />
 Gross!! I guess we give them "the ick" and they dont feel that we deserve to enjoy their product. Idk, im SO GLAD these clone houses are giving them a run for their money, showing us comparable quality for a fraction of the cost!<br />

Thanks to anyone who took the time to read my rant! padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2281762" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tripntango"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2192560"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tripntango" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2281762ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2281762" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2192560">Tripntango</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-13">09/13/24 13:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The blend of crisp, fresh, and slightly citrusy notes with a smooth, musky base creates a refreshing, clean scent. It opens with bright bergamot and mandarin, then transitions into a heart of green tea and blackcurrant. What really sets it apart for me is the subtle complexityits invigorating but elegant, making it versatile enough for both day and evening wear. Every time I wear it, it gives off an aura of sophistication and freshness without being overpowering.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2281762"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2281762#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2279999" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2279999" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pimpychi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2251432"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2251432.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pimpychi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Another-13-10131.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10131.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Another 13"title="Another 13"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2279999ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2279999" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2251432">Pimpychi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-12">09/12/24 02:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Way too synthetically sharp and spicy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2279999"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2279999#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2279060" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2279060" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="luanneog"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740949"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1740949.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="luanneog" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2279060ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2279060" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740949">luanneog</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-11">09/11/24 07:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Masculine leaning unisex fragrance. There's a synthetic quality to it when you first spray it. Later it starts to develop into a sour green tea, tangy and fruity scent. It's crisp, cold and refreshing, while at the same time, it's sour, musky and somewhat resinous. Way overpriced IMO.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2279060"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2279060#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2277501" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2277501" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="-Specs-"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1985450"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1985450.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="-Specs-" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2277501ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2277501" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1985450">-Specs-</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-09">09/09/24 19:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Let me start by saying that Im not a creed fanboy. I do like green Irish tweed a lot. And silver mountain water would be second best in the creed lineup. Silver mountain water has a very clean and crisp smell. Very masculine then it dries down a bit more feminine. The opening has a very nice green tea and black currant smell. But then it becomes literally smelling like CK one to me. Well more like CK ones older brother. While thats not necessarily a bad thing, theres no way this fragrance or any creed fragrance should cost 400-500 bucks.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2277501"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2277501#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2273187" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2267164" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lapatin Mark"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2238728"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2238728.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lapatin Mark" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.472.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Silver Mountain Water"title="Silver Mountain Water"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2267164ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2267164" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2238728">Lapatin Mark</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-31">08/31/24 11:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is by far my favorite perfume, but it will never become my main one since it costs like a well rounded dinner at a $$$$ rated restaurant with drinks ffs. <br />
<br />
Im not smart or perceptive enough to explain any of the notes in this one, its just sexy. Its a perfume which honestly goes with any season as long as youre wearing it at night. Everything about it - from the bottle to the lowest notes screams sophistication, yet it remains youthful.<br />
Perfect suit perfume.<br />
<br />
Smells like a night out when you come back to Moscow from emigration</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2267164"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2267164#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2260031" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2260031" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jelqerbator"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2184496"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2184496.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jelqerbator" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2260031ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2260031" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2184496">Jelqerbator</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-24">08/24/24 20:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blast of freshness in the opening, dries down to an excellent quality tea scent, would recommend.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2260031"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2260031#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2258867" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2258867" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rockstead"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2176629"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rockstead" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zoologist-Perfumes/Squid-56294.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56294.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Squid"title="Squid"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2258867ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2258867" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2257384" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bozojohn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2229162"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bozojohn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2257384ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2257384" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); It lasted maybe two hours tops on my skin (maybe I gotta use more lotion) the smell was nothing mind blowing for how expensive it was. Ill need to check it out later as my nose develops for these smelly waters</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2257384"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2257384#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2249185" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
