align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2107914"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2107914#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2098443" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2098443" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kid_Buu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1963669"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1963669.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kid_Buu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76580.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Paragon"title="Paragon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2098443ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2098443" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1963669">Kid_Buu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-20">03/20/24 10:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Inky, citrusy, crisp but slightly sweet. It's hard to think this smells bad... It's so light and mass appealing that you can wear it anywhere anytime and you won't offend anyone. The ONLY downside is that it just doesn't last very long. You'll get about 4-5 hours max.<br />
<br />
If you want a good clone, then grab Sillage from Armaf. It's very close to SMW. A bit sweeter, not as well blended, but lasts way longer. And it's like a tenth of the price of SMW lol.<br />
<br />
I actually like to layer the two. I do 4 sprays of SMW, and 2 of Sillage, that way I can get a little extra longevity and projection.<br />
<br />
Also, the presentation is exquisite. The bottle itself is high quality, and the atomizer is probably the best I've ever seen.<br />
<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2098443"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2098443#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2098405" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A light fresh scent, tasteful, moderately sweet, a definite unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2098405"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2098405#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2098051" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2098051" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="crookedn0se"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231585"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="crookedn0se" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Original-Santal-473.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.473.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Original Santal"title="Original Santal"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2098051ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2098051" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231585">crookedn0se</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-20">03/20/24 01:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Definitely evokes the musky 'printed money' base of Millesime Imperial, however also tainted with that sickly 'Johnson's Baby Oil' scent that sits on top; rendering it indeed like a generic face wipe of some sort. Middle notes are too 'busy' so it just smells like a generic 'waft' from a perfume department.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2098051"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2098051#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2094415" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its unobtrusiveness makes this perfect for gym or office. Would say it is unisex but sandalwood leans masculine. <br />
 9/10 because of poor longevity</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2094415"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2094415#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2093265" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2093265" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="M-as-Marin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202613"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1202613.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="M-as-Marin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Oud-Wood-1826.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1826.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Wood"title="Oud Wood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2093265ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2093265" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202613">M-as-Marin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-15">03/15/24 07:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>SMW is a strange boy, thats for sure. One thing that deviates from the norm is the lack of ambroxan/ambergris notes found in many other Creed releases. It is a musky fragrance enriched with fruity and tea notes, which means it wont be for everyone, which is a good thing. Ill also add that even if this is a masterpiece release, when we consider everything, it is still not my favourite from the brand.<br />
<br />
TOP NOTES<br />
The opening of SMW will be a hit or miss for most people. It is somewhat strange and pleasant at the same time, but the quality of the blend cannot be disputed. The first spritz on my skin reveals this weird combination of metallic, musky fruits and citruses. Its a refreshing, kind of soapy, and energetic combination of blackcurrant, bergamot, and mild orange, infused with muskiness immediately.<br />
<br />
HEART NOTES<br />
Heart notes quickly kick in after the exciting opening. For me, this is where the real magic happens as we are introduced to green tea and ozonic accord. The ozonic accord is the only aspect of this composition that will remind you of the 1990s when many ozonic and aquatic scents were available on the market. At this stage of development, I still get that ambiguity, a metallic touch of blackcurrant, and a delightful and realistic green tea accord.<br />
<br />
BASE NOTES<br />
You have a clean, musky, slightly woody, and calming scent when everything settles down. There are still slight aspects from the opening and the middle notes here, but dont expect them to be solid or bold anymore. Its not an overbearing fragrance, and certainly not something youll have to pick a particular occasion to wear. It speaks of the early spring days when everything starts to blossom; in the end, it is not that complicated.<br />
<br />
OVERALL<br />
SMW is not a perfect fragrance; it also stands for every other perfume that has been released. I was thinking about whether it deserves a holy grail status for quite some time, and in the end, I decided that it just wouldnt be fair not to place it here. As a composition that has stood the test of time and went into the perfume hall of fame with millions of users who swear by its quality, I conclude this review with its deserved ranking.<br />
<br />
Read the full review at scentgrail.com</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2093265"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2093265#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2092209" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2090300" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fj46"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2054707"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="fj46" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31396.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Halfeti"title="Halfeti"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2090300ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2090300" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2054707">fj46</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-12">03/12/24 10:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Used a decant for about a week. I think its very unisex, great for women who don't like the sweet smells of many feminine leaning fragrances. For men, its a great fresh out the shower, office/gym scent. It smells very natural and very good, but for the price point/purpose/longevity, not going to get the full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2090300"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2090300#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2087950" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2087950" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AveParfum"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/35807"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.35807.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AveParfum" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Fourreau-Noir-6595.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6595.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fourreau Noir"title="Fourreau Noir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2087950ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2087950" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/35807">AveParfum</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-10">03/10/24 07:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am late to the SMW party. Been wearing Creed for over 20 years, but never tried this one until I blind-bought it. Twenty years ago this was categorized as a mens cologne. The SA never would have offered this to me. <br />
<br />
So fast forward to 2023, and I blind-bought it. Indeed it smells like mens cologne. I have tried tons of mens fragrances in the past 30 years. I used to wear the OG Issey Miyake in college. And of course everyone can wear what they want, but clearly Creed created this for men. I wore it throughout winter, and nothing about it gives me snow or winter vibes like it was apparently created to do. Smells like lots of citrus upfront, lemon and bergamot, followed by murky evergreens and a definite note of currants. Its very beautiful and easy to see why it has endured all these years. A very distinctive fragrance for men compared to all the other stuff I have smelled in 30 years. Lasts forever on my skin. I have a brand-new bottle. It lasts all day with average projection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2087950"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2087950#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2086204" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2086204" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="connerb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1868345"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1868345.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="connerb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Pour-Homme-Parfum-71378.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71378.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci Guilty Pour Homme Parfum"title="Gucci Guilty Pour Homme Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2086204ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2086204" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1868345">connerb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-08">03/08/24 09:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>UPDATE: Scratch everything I said before this smells like a wet wipe</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2086204"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2086204#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2086026" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2086026" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jetanach"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1368248"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jetanach" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2086026ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2086026" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1368248">jetanach</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-08">03/08/24 05:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wanted to love this one, but it gave me a bit of overwhelming fruity musk something that gives me a headache. Most people around me said that it smelled good. Well, It's good but not for my everyday adventure.<br />
<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2086026"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2086026#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2083478" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2083478" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mjchaelj"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330577"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1330577.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mjchaelj" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Gentle-Fluidity-Silver-53400.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53400.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentle Fluidity Silver"title="Gentle Fluidity Silver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2083478ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2083478" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); Meteore has way better performance though. This is a waste of money but damn does it smell good. <br />
<br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2083478"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2083478#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2080162" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Plus maybe mount Everest circa 1996.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2072703"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2072703#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2068506" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2068506" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KillFox"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1826515"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1826515.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KillFox" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Electimuss/Aquila-Absolute-82663.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.82663.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aquila Absolute"title="Aquila Absolute"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2068506ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2068506" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1826515">KillFox</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-20">02/20/24 12:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was my first full bottle niche fragrance purchase, alongside Pardon by Nasomatto.<br />
<br />
I love this. It's an almost creamy green tea, with a little darkness from the black currant. A friend of mine mentioned a particular note he smells that I refuse to smell because... it ruins it for me lol if you close your eyes and smell, you can smell it. I will not share what that note is, as it is not truly within the fragrance.<br />
<br />
Nonetheless, people stating this dies down quickly... I will not say your experience is wrong, but I will say, not all fragrances need to scream. This does not scream, it sings. The fragrance is for you, and whoever you are speaking with, it is not for a whole room to smell. I do not understand why someone would want all their fragrances to scream in the first place. This fragrance is, what it was supposed to be. Very pleasant.<br />
<br />
Edit: today, this has lasted 10 hours already. Again, it is not a sillage bomb, but I keep getting wafts of the fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2068506"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2068506#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2066859" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2065530" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bizzy1995"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1963702"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bizzy1995" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-523.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.523.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme"title="Allure Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2065530ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2065530" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1963702">Bizzy1995</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-17">02/17/24 16:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can describe the opening in 4 words: Cat Pissy Black currant. <br />
<br />
As it dries down its so green and fresh its almost unbearable. <br />
<br />
They shouldve called this green Absolu</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2065530"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2065530#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2063246" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The citrus notes combined with the tea works so well and gives me this relaxation feel thats amazing. I wore this sample and was hoping for it to still continue to last and keep this amazing scent profile, however, I was SEVERELY dissapointed. <br />
<br />
This lasted about 4 hours on my skin and was so dissapointing for me. I think I have to go resort to find a clone of this or something because I love this DNA, but hate how it dissapated so fast and heard lots of Creeds are like this now<br />
<br />

padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947247">jdvice</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-01">02/01/24 17:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really like the smell of this fragrance. Bought a sample and its amazing how fresh it is. Performance was severely lacking; maybe 2 hours. I feel like its not worth the price theyre asking.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2049352"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2049352#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2049095" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2049095" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jameskw3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1727779"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1727779.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jameskw3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2049095ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2049095" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1727779">jameskw3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-01">02/01/24 12:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Since 2017, I have only ever bought more than one bottle of a fragrance twice. SMW and Versace pour homme are the only ones. I am absolutely in love with this scent. I get tons of musk from my F batch, and surprisingly more citrus than tea imo. On my skin it wears somewhat linear. Performance isn't great, but the quality of the notes are fantastic. Im not one to wear fresh in winter, but this parfum gives a certain type of "vibe" that I think passes for moderately warm winter days. Uniqueness is a massive deciding factor in cologne for me, and while I don't think this is the most unique scent out there, the quality of the ingredients make up for it. Will be my signature for likely years to come.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2049095"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2049095#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2045879" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2045879" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="skm50"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1972484"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="skm50" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Jacobs/Daisy-Wild-89906.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89906.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Daisy Wild"title="Daisy Wild"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2045879ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2045879" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1972484">skm50</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-29">01/29/24 12:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells good. Fresh, crisp, inky, and slightly sweet. A bit too inky smelling for me to want to wear every day. Performance sucks though. Like whyyy.. I dropped all this cash for a scent that disappears like Houdini?? Wtf is that about But anyway, I discovered Armaf, which has a FANTASTIC dupe called Sillage that smells almost identical and is very very long lasting/good projection. I like it even more than SMW and returned the SMW. Sorry Creed, y'all dropped the ball on this one, you ain't robbing me. Just get the dupe, folks. Don't buy into the hype like I did.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2045879"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2045879#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2043771" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2031964" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="punkkbott"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1215187"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="punkkbott" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2031964ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2031964" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1215187">punkkbott</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-15">01/15/24 17:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is just the perfect clean unisex scent on me. I love it so much. Mostly pick up the tea, bergamot, and sandalwood.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2031964"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2031964#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2028415" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2028415" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dantek121"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580375"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1580375.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dantek121" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2028415ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2028415" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580375">dantek121</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-12">01/12/24 00:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Underrated IMO and a great, striking, fresh scent. Smells amazing in the air. There's always vintage batch craziness when diving into Creed. If you seek vintage batches of this fragrance you will find that they do last longer than current batches. Compared to the second hand market of vintage bottles of other Creed fragrances, vintage SMW is better priced than vintage Aventus for instance. Just be sure that the top notes are still fresh because the citrus can turn. Between testing a 2014 batch and 2021 batch, the former lasted longer but the depth of the scent was similar.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2028415"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2028415#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2026072" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2026072" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="oTEMPE5To"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1748370"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1748370.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="oTEMPE5To" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10559.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sartorial"title="Sartorial"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2026072ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2026072" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1748370">oTEMPE5To</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-09">01/09/24 19:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Out of Silver mountain water, CDN Sillage, and Xerjoff Mefisto I think I like the smell of this the most- its smoother and rounder with a sweetness to it, but boy is it ever a fleeting fragrance. SMW sits somewhere in that 2 hour range for me, spending most of that time as slight skin scent though I suspect I could be nose blind, Armaf Sillage was a bit sharp smelling to me but the performance is through the roof and lasts over 12 hours on me; I honestly find it too strong for the first 4 hours. Lastly Mefisto has a bit much rose for my taste, but after about an hour blends really nicely- and sits somewhere in the 4-5hour range for performance; also spending most of that time close to the skin.<br />
<br />
I do believe an element to the lack of performance from this could simply be nose blindness because I can smell it on the collar of my tshirt the next day, and get wafts of it when having a shower in the evening, same with mefisto. I do wonder if its to do with Xerjoff and Creed using more natural materials or something?? <br />
<br />
My bottle is a 2021 batch and doesn't smell as cold as sillage did. It's got a slight warmness to it and is incredibly smooth. No sharp metallic notes or anything. It would one of my favorites if it had more oomph. <br />
<br />
Really need to test Gentleuomo next because this type of signature has really grown on me.<br />
<br />
EDIT: Got a fb of gentleuomo, it's incredible. Favorite. But smw is close. It's smoother and better for an evening. Getting this 2021 batch has me intrigued about the older batches, or the new 2023 ones which may dethrone gentleuomo</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2026072"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2026072#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2024913" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2024913" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="raj.kanaj"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1080477"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1080477.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="raj.kanaj" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Y-Elixir-90024.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90024.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Y Elixir"title="Y Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2024913ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2024913" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1080477">raj.kanaj</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-08">01/08/24 19:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sprayed this side by side with Armaf Club De Nuit Sillage today<br />
<br />
The Creed had more Depth and was smoother.  <br />
Higher quality Definitely. <br />
However the Creed paled in performance<br />
Sillage had a much brighter fresh citrus opening but was projecting <br />
and skin scent at 5hr mark<br />
<br />
SMW sat closer to the skin for about 5 hours when it wore off<br />
<br />
Not sure if im missing anything entirely<br />
only had a sample of SMW which is what im basing this all off<br />
There is no reason at all to buy this !<br />
its about 'twice' as good in depth quality (not performance) as Sillage <br />
but thats it!<br />
but at 7 times the price ??<br />
Not against anyone that can afford this<br />
but this a no brainer</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2024913"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2024913#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2020556" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1879480">AndosTheGreat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-04">01/04/24 17:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont get why its called Silver Mountain water because this smells like people throwing moldy oranges around at a construction site on a 35 degrees celcius day, then concentrated the moldy juice along with dusts into this bottle</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2020556"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2020556#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2014722" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; There will be a line of 3 Amber based fragrances, also..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2014610"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2014610#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2012686" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2012686" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RhettB27"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345688"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1345688.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RhettB27" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/John-Varvatos/Artisan-Pure-46623.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46623.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Artisan Pure"title="Artisan Pure"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2012686ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2012686" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345688">RhettB27</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-27">12/27/23 21:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I do enjoy the Aventus DNA and really love Aventus Cologne, but SMW is becoming my favorite Creed fragrance.  The green tea, petit grain, and galbanum combo in the base is immaculate, so perfectly and invigoratingly green. This is a fragrance you spray and say damn, and imo encapsulates what wearing fragrances should be. A special treat that makes you appreciate the art every time you spray it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="2012686"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=2012686#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2012115" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
