padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1456747">Michele_rabbit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-18">10/18/23 09:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Mouse011 you are so right! I have bought smw this summer I think, it was June and I immediately thought it was little too much for the summer temperatures. For me, its mostly problem of the sandalwood that makes this fragrance warm in the dry down and little too heavy for summer heat imo. Black currant is also a problematic for me during warmer months. I absolutely adore to wear it now especially inside in the evening hours. Its so comforting, fresh yet warm, creamy, slightly metallic, heavenly scent!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="1955079"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=1955079#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1953557" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1953557" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mouse011"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178077"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1178077.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mouse011" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/SpongeBob-Squarepants/SpongeBob-28286.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28286.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="SpongeBob"title="SpongeBob"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1953557ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1953557" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178077">Mouse011</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-16">10/16/23 16:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Am i the only person who love wearing smw only in winter? The colder is, better is.<br />
Couple years in a row i'm wearing it only when winter comes.<br />
That metalic natural sharp freshines makes me feel like im on swiss mountains. <br />
Step by step smw becoming one of my favourite freshies, but really the special one. <br />
<br />
2025 smw will celebrate the 30th birthday, i mean wth??<br />
It have absolutely notihing in common with decade in which was realeased. <br />
<br />
Can't count how many compliments i got on smw, this is highly likable fragrance, everybody like it, especially girls.<br />
If you want to smell sexy, just spray smw on clean skin...<br />
Smells freshie, exciting, expensive, and above all it's still unique even after unbelievably 28 years.<br />
<br />
Just don't searching for cheap clones, there is no quality like Creed &amp; Bourdon done,<br />
Don't forget SMW was realeased when Creed was Creed.<br />
I don't think David Bowie was crazy :)<br />
<br />
Unfortunately, Creed house started to "fade" somewhere after 2013...14...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="1953557"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=1953557#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1943339" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1943339" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="yazzakasbah"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1811845"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1811845.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="yazzakasbah" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-Dusita/Le-Sillage-Blanc-40838.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40838.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Sillage Blanc"title="Le Sillage Blanc"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1943339ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1943339" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1811845">yazzakasbah</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-03">10/03/23 12:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First off if you had any doubts, this is never ever worth the money. It's a freshie, not a work of art. The bottle is the ugliest I've seen yet. Looks and feels cheap. This is a case of paying for the name. A name I will never look for again.<br />
<br />
On paper:<br />
Lovely fresh fruity herbal blend. Smells pleasant and is not sweet. <br />
The dry down seems a bit samey. Like a good but generic cologne.<br />
<br />
On the wrists:<br />
It loses a lot of its cold airyness and is more cologney from the start. The black currant is a bit more pronounced, which is nice. All in all it feels pleasant but unnecessary; its performance is weak.<br />
<br />
I'd recommend Acqua di Parma Colonia or Colonia Futura over this. I think it's a much better quality experience at a third of the price. In fact in direct comparison the Creed smells cheap and artificial.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="1943339"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=1943339#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1942541" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1942541" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="phylogeneric"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1089293"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="phylogeneric" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-Parfum-49912.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49912.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel Parfum"title="Bleu de Chanel Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1942541ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1942541" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1089293">phylogeneric</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-02">10/02/23 11:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wonderful scent. It's pricey but once I tried it I had to have it. It's the best fresh scent I have tried, thus far. You will be hardpressed to find something just as unique, yet pleasing. I honestly prefer it over Aventus (although they have much different aims). After years of going through colognes I have finally come to the only 2 I need: this for office/day trips and BdC Parfum for nights out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="1942541"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=1942541#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1941930" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1941930" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frankyt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1851597"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1851597.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frankyt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1941930ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1941930" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1851597">frankyt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-01">10/01/23 14:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Excellent fragrance, very fresh and easy to wear with a little bit of green as well. My go to when wearing in office spaces. <br />
<br />
9.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="1941930"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=1941930#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1935233" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1935233" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NoirMemoir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329296"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1329296.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NoirMemoir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Eros-Flame-52180.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52180.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eros Flame"title="Eros Flame"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1935233ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1935233" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329296">NoirMemoir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-23">09/23/23 05:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A couple of weeks ago i went absolutely ballistic on Silver Mountain Water and i feel like i was unfair and frankly quiet barbaric in my approach so i deleted my review and i will try to write a more grounded opinion.<br />
<br />
I got a 50ml decant of Creed Silver Mountain Water for 55 dollars. Decanted off a 2021 batch 250ml Carafe. It was a jaw dropping price but what infuriated me was how such an expensive fragrance doesn't have the performance. <br />
<br />
I wore it today to a wedding where i didn't feel comfortable with an obnoxious or boisterous fragrance and it was a great choice! <br />
<br />
Onto the scent: Silver Mountain Water is a fitting name because it is a fresh and clean, green bitter citrusy, cold, mineraly fragrance. Some perceive it as inky or metallic and i can understand that, with some imagination it can remind me of ball pen ink. I've never smelled Millesime Imperiale, only its clone Armaf Milestone and i definetly get the similarities but SMW feels colder while Milestone is saltier, fruttier, more "melony". But the salty/mineraly touches are what they both share. I think Millesime Imperial or Milestone is better suited for summer because of the added fruitiness. <br />
 <br />
The imagery i get with Silver Mountain Water is a small waterfall on the rocky slopes of a mountain, on a cold and foggy late autumn day, winter being just around the corner. To this day, this is the only fragrance that gives me chills because of how cold it smells like, especially when i sometimes put a spray on my hand during the colder months.<br />
<br />
I still maintain my opinion that it is not worth the price tag unless 300+ dollars mean nothing to you and you really love the scent profile. I think unless you have an incredibly refined nose or you are against clone fragrances by principle, the ARMAF dupes more then satisfy the craving for this scent DNA and from what i hear they perform way better too. <br />
<br />
Oh by the way, i just noticed this fragrance came out in 1995! If it came out in 2023 no one would question it, thats a big plus. I think the black currant makes it abstract and therefore timeless. From my experience, black currant as a note is very interesting as many people will be intrigued by it and really like it (hence the compliment factor of scents such as Armaf CDNIM / Creed Aventus) but some absolutely hate it and i also think it might be the note responsible for the "inkyness" in Creed SMW.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="1935233"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=1935233#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1930706" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1930706" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zigf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1336218"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1336218.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zigf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1930706ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1930706" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1336218">Zigf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-18">09/18/23 00:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its like the clearest and the most transparent parfume Ive ever had. Longevity on my skin is decent, but sillage is very intimate. The perfect parfume for the office and everyday wearing imo, on par with Prada LHomme, but a little more risky, more musky and fruity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="1930706"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=1930706#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1929471" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1929471" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gio786"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1830334"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gio786" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1929471ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1929471" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1830334">Gio786</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-16">09/16/23 11:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells good and you do get the Bergamot and black current but for me It does not last long, and for the price you can get better summer scents that last longer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="1929471"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=1929471#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1928089" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1928089" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="POTFORTY2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657706"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="POTFORTY2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1928089ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1928089" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657706">POTFORTY2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-14">09/14/23 17:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont care for Club De Nuit Sillage but I LOVE silver mountain water. Its odd because theyre so similar but the Armaf is a bit dirtier in a way I really dont admire. The dirtiness of Armaf is not a huge difference but it really ruins the scent for me.<br />
<br />
I also get great longevity out of SMW it lasts all day. Id say the scent is a bit soft in Sillage but I think it would be obnoxious if it was loud. <br />
<br />
Honestly the stuff is amazing I own creed Viking, GIT, and Aventus but every time I wear SMW its my favorite.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="1928089"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=1928089#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1927401" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1927401" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Florind"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/835858"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.835858.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Florind" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/House-Of-Sillage/Emerald-Reign-16890.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16890.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Emerald Reign"title="Emerald Reign"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1927401ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1927401" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/835858">Florind</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-13">09/13/23 22:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's OK for men. crowd pleasing<br />
not too masculine<br />
spiky silvery icy liquid, flower scented ice cube for man</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="1927401"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=1927401#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1926522" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1926522" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KerriZ"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506615"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1506615.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KerriZ" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1926522ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1926522" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); On me it was a delightful citrusy tea with a dose of fresh green. Lasted about 4 hours on me. Maybe not enough to justify the Creed price tag but if you shop around you can find it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="1926522"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=1926522#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1924694" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1921764" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jbozz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445544"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1445544.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jbozz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/MYSLF-Le-Parfum-94983.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.94983.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="MYSLF Le Parfum"title="MYSLF Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1921764ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1921764" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445544">jbozz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-07">09/07/23 01:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the King of fresh and clean. I am absolutely head over heals in love with Silver Mountain Water, and I understand those who feel this is absolutely Creed's finest offering. It's simply a beautiful clean white scent with the most refreshing natural smell I've ever encountered in fragrance. To me the musk is light and not overbearing at all. I literally can't stop sniffing my arm where I sprayed. It projects for only about an hour, but it actually lasts on skin for a good 5-6 hours with wafts and a light scent trail present as you move around. Nothing in the designer world smells quite this beautiful and natural to me. Any hype for this is real and justified in my opinion. Aventus, Aventus Cologne, Millesime Imperial, and Silver Mountain Water, thats all I need from Creed!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="1921764"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=1921764#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1921529" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1918142" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bearded_King"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1574722"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1574722.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bearded_King" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1918142ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1918142" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1574722">Bearded_King</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-02">09/02/23 15:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought my current bottle of Silver Mountain Water back in 2019. This batch was strong when I used it for the summer at that time. Now, in 2023, summertime in Houston Texas weather, this fragrance doesnt last for shit!<br />
<br />
Not gonna lie, it still smells as if I first bought it, but the performance is trash.(sniffing) I still get that inky smell from the Black Currant, I still get that citrus from the mandarine and the polarizing green tea note,  and the freshness from the bergamot. After 30min - an hour, the fragrance becomes a skin scent. Ive havent gotten not even 1 compliment by wearing it in 2023. No one can smell it. If theres no projection, at least have an scent bubble or something. But no, nothing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="1918142"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=1918142#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1918022" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1918022" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Towels"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1796349"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Towels" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1918022ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1918022" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1796349">Towels</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-02">09/02/23 12:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells nice. Fresh tea-ish scent on top with a lot of musk underneath. Too musky for me. I totally get the "Ink" smell from this people talk about. This is severely overpriced. It's nice but it's not amazing. There's just so many other fragrances which will make a better impression for less than half the price. This fragrance is so much hype for just a subtle musky green tea. There's nothing in here that reminds me of the mountains or silver water.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="1918022"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=1918022#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1910568" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1910568" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Verdure80"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1685620"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1685620.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Verdure80" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Bois-D-Argent-48396.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48396.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bois D'Argent"title="Bois D'Argent"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1910568ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1910568" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1685620">Verdure80</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-24">08/24/23 13:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful abstract metallic opening with a sweet and creamy sandalwood drydown. I'm surprised to see galbanum ranked so low on the note breakdown, as it really stands out to me in the scent. Silver Mountain Water is an absolute masterpiece of perfumery and without a doubt one of my all time favorite scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="1910568"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=1910568#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1910025" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1910025" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WeezyPipes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1764595"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1764595.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="WeezyPipes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-9828.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9828.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus"title="Aventus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1910025ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1910025" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1764595">WeezyPipes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-23">08/23/23 23:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love the top notes but it quickly turns musky and is less refreshing. Almost reminds me of Platinum Egoiste with that cold metallic tinge. SMW would be a good office scent but I wouldn't spend Creed money on a daily driver. I feel like it's objectively pleasant yet I rarely reach for my sample, it's just not very exciting after the first few minutes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="1910025"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=1910025#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1908296" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1908296" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sophia97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1670870"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sophia97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-Absolu-21547.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21547.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bright Crystal Absolu"title="Bright Crystal Absolu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1908296ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1908296" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1670870">Sophia97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-22">08/22/23 00:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This bottle was my blind buy and oh, I can not tell you how much I am in love with this fragrance. Everytime I wear this fragrance I get tons of compliments. It's definetly a compliment getter. This is a great option to have for those humid summer days because it's fresh and doesn't overpower me. If you are having double thought while purchasing this fragrance, I would say, JUST BUY IT!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="1908296"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=1908296#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1907297" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1907297" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jaxsonfj"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1382791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1382791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jaxsonfj" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Parfum-27417.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.27417.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Parfum"title="Dior Homme Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1907297ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1907297" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1382791">Jaxsonfj</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-20">08/20/23 18:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my favorite fresh/clean fragrance.<br />
<br />
I have 50+ bottles of niche/designer perfumes, and If I had to keep only 3, I would pick Dior Homme parfum,YSL Tuxedo, and Silver Mountain Water.<br />
<br />
it is fresh. it is clean. it is floral. The metallic scent that it has is what really makes this stand out as the perfect fresh scene for me.<br />
<br />
I would say this is a blind buy if it wasn't in the ~$400 range.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="472"comment_id="1907297"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html?ccid=1907297#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1906797" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
